mapper.select: select b.article_no , b.user_id, m.user_name, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time from board b, members m where b.user_id=m.user_id order by article_no
select b.article_no , b.user_id, m.user_name, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time from board b, members m where b.user_id=m.user_id and b.article_no=#{articleNo}
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, register_time=now() where article_no=#{articleNo}
update board set hit=hit+1 where article_no=#{articleNo}
